response.answer_text: Sometimes it happens that we want to write in the cursive but we can not write it correctly. Through this article, you will learn the lines used in the curse. So that you write in cursive with quick, clear and more skill and mastery in handwriting.  Try to understand the letters written in cursive Firstly, learn the rotation of the letters. Try to learn how the lines are inserted. There is a form of writing small and large letters. All these things you can learn successfully from any class or handwriting textbook online. Practice writing After learning the lines used in cursive, practice writing them. First, start with one word, and then write several rows. You can also get help online to learn more about them.  Type Alphabetical Order Now you should try writing in small and uppercase letters from A to Z. Use different letters using alphabet letters so that you can understand and write lines more efficiently. Write A Few Sentences Try short and then gradually write long sentences. Just type the words of a song or the words you hear every day and your name in the cursive. Advice Rather than writing the letters of the entire alphabet in small and large forms, write a sentence such as "Da Quick Brown Fox Jumps Up Over the Lazy Dog" in a cursive. It contains all the letters of the alphabet.Even a little bit while writing, this will clear your handwriting.If you have a journal or diary, practice writing in it.To practice, you can also use the nursery books available in the market, in which points of the points will be made. You can also learn about the angle and exact interval from such books.View and learn the articles written by others in the cursive. With this, you will be able to differentiate between yourself and others' writing.Get help from a friend or someone who comes to write in cursive. They will be able to tell you in detail about the lines.

Basically, cursive letters are written joined together in a flowing manner.
